translations.source: Hello, welcome to our video tutorial.
translations.target: 你好，欢迎观看我们的视频教程。

translations.source: Today we will learn about machine learning.
translations.target: 今天我们将学习机器学习。

translations.source: This technology is transforming many industries.
translations.target: 这项技术正在改变许多行业。

translations.source: Thank you for watching, and see you next time.
translations.target: 谢谢观看，我们下次再见。
